reviewText: After watching several times I still had questions about the actual mechanism for the production of the light

Great movie for any fan of a peek into the future. Beautifully done. Fascinating subject and very intelligent insight. Who needs space
travel when we have our seas.

I checked this DVD out at our local library for my 6 year old daughter who is very interested in ocean life. I had to video tape her face at one point because she looked completely involved in it, wide eyes and mouth open. We haven't even had the DVD for a week and she's already watched it at least 4 times. I'm considering buying it now! The book Down, Down, Down by Steve Jenkins is what first interested my daughter in deep sea creatures and bioluminescence.
Very good and informative.  Quite detailed, but interesting for those that want to learn about these creatures.
